channel.title: Chat-Application on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Chat-Application on Arrans github.io

item.title: tinode/chat
item.description: Instant messaging platform. Backend in Go. Clients: Swift iOS, Java Android, JS webapp, scriptable command line; chatbots

item.title: SebastienBtr/Dash-Chat-2
item.description: The most complete Chat UI for flutter. Easy to use, highly customizable and fully featured

item.title: fingerthief/minimal-chat
item.description: MinimalChat is a lightweight, open-source chat application that allows you to interact with various large language models.
